titleStmt.title: The eyght bookes of Caius Iulius Cæsar conteyning his martiall exploytes in the realme of Gallia and the countries bordering vppon the same translated oute of latin into English by Arthur Goldinge G.
De bello Gallico. English
titleStmt.author: Caesar, Julius.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
Hirtius, Aulus. De bello Gallico. Liber 8.

notesStmt.note: The eighth book is attributed to Aulus Hirtius and to others.
Quire 2N is in two settings: line 2 colophon ends (1) "dwel-" or (2) "dwelling".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
